alert.note: Alert for Clay; Lincoln; Turner; Yankton (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 2:39AM MDT until July 12 at 3:30AM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Clay County in southeastern South Dakota... Southwestern Lincoln County in southeastern South Dakota... East central Yankton County in southeastern South Dakota... Southeastern Turner County in southeastern South Dakota... * Until 430 AM CDT. * At 339 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mayfield, or 11 miles northeast of Yankton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Irene and Volin around 350 AM CDT. Wakonda around 355 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Viborg, Centerville and Beresford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
